Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Westbound Reroute near Oriole/Canfield
ShortDescription: Westbound 88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Talcott, Oriole and Devon: due to, street blockage near Oriole/Canfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Talcott, Oriole and Devon: due to, street blockage near Oriole/Canfield.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Armitage
ShortDescription: SB 94 California buses are temp. rerouted via California, Armitage, Western, North Avenue and California: due to, street blockage near California/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at 35th- Bronzeville-IIT. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at 35th- Bronzeville-IIT. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
